snippet.title: The Dishwasher: Vampire Smile Trailer
snippet.description:
As seen at Xbox's February Showcase: Created by award-winning indie developer James Silva exclusively for Xbox LIVE Arcade, "The Dishwasher: Vampire Smile" features solo and co-op campaigns, 50 intense arcade challenges, an almost endless Dish Challenge, and now for the first time, the combo-fueled action will be playable in 3-D. 

ESRB Rating: MATURE
